reviewText: This is an intelligent film. The comedic figure of the main character ,love of film is not enough to overcome the major tension of Islam and the present era. Not a comedy.it is a sad drama. The subject does not work as a comedy.

ok to watch if you don't have anything else to do. simple folk and a simple story. nice action, direction. but one of those rare stories which tries to show how borders wreck lives which are so similar on either side.

It's an art film. I really like the happy go lucky attitude of the protagonist who is able to happy and induce happiness in others around him in spite of his captivity. It's a really well made movie. All the actors have acted really well.
Good comedy with an important closing theme.
Amazing story, on point direction, mind blowing acting!
